es.upm.oeg.semanticmeasures.impl.crosslingual

Class CosineSimilarityCLBetweenOntologyEntities

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.upm.oeg.semanticmeasures.impl.crosslingual.WordVectorsCL
      • es.upm.oeg.semanticmeasures.impl.crosslingual.CosineSimilarityCLBetweenOntologyEntities
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Relatedness, RelatednessBetweenOntologyEntities

    public class CosineSimilarityCLBetweenOntologyEntities
extends WordVectorsCL
implements RelatednessBetweenOntologyEntities
    Computes the semantic similarity between two ontology entities based on the Cosine Similarity metric

      • getValue

        public double getValue(java.lang.Object object1,
                       java.lang.Object element1,
                       java.lang.Object object2,
                       java.lang.Object element2)
        Computes the embeddings-based value of the relatedness between two entities from two ontologies. It performs elementary computations of "cosine similarity" to compare several features of the ontological description of the compared entities. Such features are combined by means of multilayer perceptrons (one for classes and another one for properties) to produce a final value.
        Specified by:
        getValue in interface Relatedness
        Parameters:
        object1 - URI of the source ontology
        element1 - URI of the source entity
        object2 - URI of the target ontology
        element2 - URI of the target element
        Returns:
        relatedness value
